1.content:
Priyanka roy is an atheletic indian girl with a perfect body and always had a bitchy smile on her face...
She is 18 and just passed 12 th grade...Her mother was a famous politician preeti roy..age 40....

Her cousin ritesh was 21 and just graduated....He had come over to their house to ask preeti if she could somehow managed to arrange a job for him.... Preeti could have done it easily if she wanted but she wasn't that kind..She told him to stay at their house till she finds a suitable job for him..

It was 5 a.m. in the morning.."Ritesh,where are you saale.." priyanka shouted from her bed sleepily....Ritesh was sleeping too..but he woke up hearing her voice....He asked him why she had called him... "Oh,make some coffe for me before i finish brushing.." with that she woke up went to brush her teeth...Ritesh was left puzzled...She was treating him as if He was her servant...But he decided just to make some coffe for her and then get back to sleep again..he made her some coffee and offered her the coffee... She sat down on the sofa and started sipping her coffee...Ritesh turned around and was leaving the room....But he was stopped by priyanka...."hey Ritesh,where do you think you're going??"priyanka said a bit sternly.. "I am going to sleep", Ritesh said in an irritated tone....although he always thought she was sexy and hot,he never really liked her because of her attitude...

"what's with that irritated tone of yours, twerp", priyanka said a bit angrily..."i said i am going to sleep",ritesh wanted to avoid quarreling with her..so he lowered his voice.. "Well i don't want you sleep" priyanka said with a smirk and placed her legs on the stool... "who are you to decide that?" Ritesh said a bit angrily.."You're staying at my house without paying any money...and also you need my mother's help for getting a job,so you should better please me by obeying me",priyanka said confidently... "like hell i would",ritesh turned around to leave the room... But before he could get to the door,he was stoped by priyanka... She had got him in a tight hold....She had pinned his hands towards his back and her knee was resting on his back... "Now cousin bro,you're no match for me..so just surrender and do whatever i say..or else I'll rip you apart in two.." She said with a smirk... Ritesh tried to get himself free from her hold,,But she was stronger than him..his back and hands were starting to pain.."i'll never do that" he said agrily while groaning in pain...priyanka increased the pressure of her knees and said,"Be my slave ,or else am gonna show you hell ".."Just get off me",ritesh said now screaming in pain...She let go of him and said,"Ok ,i let go of you ,now just be my slave and i'll hurt you less..."... "No,never" Ritesh tried to run once again,,,,..but she caught him again and this time pinned him down on the ground and sat on top of him..."say me priiyanka didi ka kutta hu,then i'll let you go,may be" ,priyanka said victoriously... "No...i would never say that..besides i am older than you",Ritesh was still resisting... Priyanka started slaping him hard..His cheeks started to turn red.."I am gonna keep slapping your face till you surrender and kiss my feet to show your devotion",priyanka was having fun slapping him...her slaps were getting harder and harder...Ritesh felt like he face was gonna crack from her slaps..But still it was impossible for him to obey what she was saying..But her slaps were getting unbrearable...the pain was over powering him...he decided to surrender for then and think about a solution later...

"ok ok,i'll do what you say,please leave me.."ritesh pleaded...Priyanka smirked,"Now,that's better..but not yet good enough..plead properly.."..."big sis,please leave me",ritesh said politely..."ha ha,are you ever gonna speak in a high tone with me again?" .."No didi.." ritesh said helplessly.."he he,good ..now say you're my dog.." priyanka was having fun with him...Ritesh hesitated a bit which was rewarded by a hard slap on his left cheek.."hurry up!!"periyanka said slapping him once again.."M priyanka sis's doggie",ritesh said looking away from her..."hm..not good enough..say looking into my eyes",she was really enjoying it..."M priyanka ma'm's slave",he said looking into her eyes and tears started to fall from from his eyes from shame...."ha ha ha",priyanka laughed at him and mocked him,"aw but you don't have a tail doggie..."..All ritesh could do was look away from her and shed tears of shame.."Now then,kiss my feet!!fast" priyanka brought her feet near his face...Ritesh knew he had no other choice..he wished he had never come to their house...He lightly kissed her feet and moved him face away,,...''Not enought,,,kiss my feet 100 times",priyanka said smirking... Ritesh was really broken now..."please priyanka...please...i can't do it..please make me do something else..i can't do it..."

113.content:
Priyanka smiled as she sipped her coffee luxuriating in the feel of her older cousin's lips as they pressed softly to her feet and toes. Her smile grew as she occasionally felt the tip of his tongue brush along her smooth skin. She knew that her feet must smell, but she did not care. She had not showered the day before after a long, grueling day at school and then football practice after followed by the long walk home along the dirty streets of Mumbai; its filthy lower caste lining the gutters and groveling as she passed.

Since a little girl she had fantasized about those lesser dregs of life as she had walked home, dreaming that they should one day find purpose in serving her. She often dreamed of the old days; the times she had read about in history books when those indentured and indebted would pay off their need, serving for their owners every whim until such time as they might be free again. Priyanka smiled knowing that if the opportunity ever arose for her, the indentured servant would never be freed.

It was only natural she thought, the way things should be. Those that HAD should of course lord over those who wanted, and the needy should happily serve their betters in order to improve their lot in life and better their station on the Kharmic Wheel. And who better than Priyanka to help those poor unfortunates along?

Priyanka was pretty and she knew it. Her skin was soft and smooth, unblemished and a deep golden tan from the Eastern sun. She was strong and athletic, healthy and desirable she knew with her long, raven black hair and pouty lips, which could just as easily curl into a wicked smile. Many a boy at school had melted at her glance; her dark almond eyes so entrancing. Who better to have a servant than she? Who might be more deserving?

Maybe her mother she mused as she felt her cousin's tongue lapping gently between her toes. She flexed her foot a bit to give him better access loving the feel of his new devotion. Priyanka sipped her coffee again as she watched Ritesh groveling at her feet... at her bidding. He was no better than the rabble on the street she passed every day it seemed, and despite his meager protests, far less proud than the common, lower caste beggar.

He had brought this on himself of course. Her older cousin had come begging at the door for his mother's help in finding a job over two weeks past. His father and mother were far poorer than Priyaka's, her mother Preeta being a famous and powerful politician. They lived in a veritable mansion with grounds and a pool, three luxurious floors with all the amenities that Mumbai's finest might offer. And servants of course, which pleased Priyanka no end; housekeepers, gardeners and maids to dote on her, at least somewhat.

Prinyanka shifted her legs and giggled as Ritesh scrambled to stay with her bare feet, kissing madly over and over. She had ordered a thousand kisses on her feet but of course had not been counting. The simple fact that Ritesh was there at her feet and on his knees before her, worshiping her as she deserved was all that mattered. She thought how her older cousin would make a good addition to the house staff and maybe even a slave if he proved worthy. He had come to her mother wishing for a job after all. It seemed Priyaka had found his calling.

"Oh my..."

Priyanka sputtered and felt the warm dampness on her chest as spilled coffee dribbled onto the silky camisole that she wore to bed as a nightgown. She looked up at the clack of heels on the polished marble floor in the hallway as her mother Preeta strolled into her bedroom seemingly nonplussed at seeing her almost naked nephew on his knees before her daughter lounging on the bed. Her mother smiled as she walked up beside Ritesh fiddling with the stud on an earring.

Preeta was a lovely, mature woman of forty years; an older version of Priyanka really though far more dignified. She had her long black hair up in a tight bun, and was wearing a smart western business suit of a gray jacket and knee-length skirt and a blouse shaded a dusky white. She wore little make-up letting her natural beauty take dominance and few bangles besides her old wedding band and a delicate watch on her left wrist. Priyanka's eyes were wide with anticipation as her mother glanced down at her kneeling nephew then turned her attention to her daughter.

"What's this then?" her mother asked and Priyanka was shocked to hear her calm, cool tone. It was as though it were an everyday occurence for her to walk in on such a scene and Priyanka sputtered again to find her voice.Preeta laughed at her daughter's discomfort.

"I see you've found a job for this retch before I could, daughter. How fitting..."

"Auntie..." Ritesh said or tried to. Suddenly Preeta's foot lashed out as the toe of her leather pump slammed into the younger man's ribs. He howled in pain and fell to his side writhing in sudden agony as Preeta smiled down. Priyanka stared in shock and disbelief, curling her long bare legs under her and sliding back a bit on the bed.

"I was going to take this dog to work today," her mother said, "maybe get him some menial job at the consulate. It seems you've eliminated his need for employment." Priyanka's mother smirked as Ritesh moaned and whimpered on the floor. "My sister - your aunt knows just how lazy and worthless he is, which is why she sent him here hoping to better him, or at least find his true purpose in life. We've discovered that I guess."

"Mother..." Priyanka said softly as she set her coffee cup on the bedside table. She leaned forward shocked and confused, and just a little bit excited she had to admit. She had never dreamed that her ordering Ritesh about would lead to this scene - she had just been having a bit of fun with her gutless cousin. But now her mother seemed to approve and actually joined in on his debasement and humiliation. Priyanka smiled as she saw her cousin look up in horror, his eyes darting between the two women.

Preeta waved Priyanka's worries away as she stepped up to tower over the beaten man on the floor. "I figured it would come to this. He's useless and pathetic; a waste of air if you ask me. If not that he was my sister's son he'd be grubbing for rupies in the gutters outside with the rest of his ilk. But fate has brought him here to our house and shown you the way, dear daughter. It'smy own fault, I suppose."

"Mother?" Priyanka said as she inched forward again placing her feet back on the floor. She saw Ritesh following her movements but ignored him for the moment.

"Your father was like this one," her mother said as she raised her foot and hovered the sole over Ritesh's face. His eyes went wide as she lowered her foot, pressing down until he got the hint. Priyanka watched with excitement as her cousin licked at the sole of her mother's shoe. "Your father was my slave, willingly and with love. You never realized but he doted on you as well. This one however... There's no love here." Preeta watched as the young man licked at her shoes, his tongue gliding along the supple, worn leather. Priyanka watched as well feeling a damp warmth between her legs to see her cousin humbled so. Finally Preeta shoved with her foot to send Ritesh sprawling. She smoothed her skirt and turned to Priyanka.

"He'll need training. You seem able to handle that. I have a meeting at the American consulate in a half hour so I'll leave that to you then. Just remember that he's no longer your cousin, rather a dog of the lowest caste. He's fit only to be the slave you always wanted my dear Priyanka."

Priyanka's face brightened at that. She smiled as she looked down on her shocked and astounded cousin...
